name: Sarah Chen
title: Senior ML Engineer
summary: Seasoned ML Engineer with 8 years of experience building production ML systems. Led team of 5 engineers at TechCorp Solutions implementing Azure ML platform. Expert in MLOps, CI/CD for ML models, and scalable data pipelines.

name: Marcus Johnson
title: Data Scientist
summary: Data Scientist specializing in predictive analytics and experimentation. 6 years experience in e-commerce and tech. Strong statistical background with focus on causal inference and business impact measurement.

name: Priya Sharma
title: AI Research Engineer
summary: AI Research Engineer with 5 years focusing on NLP and large language models. Published 3 papers at top conferences. Experience deploying research prototypes to production at DataFlow Analytics.

name: James Williams
title: Cloud Solutions Architect
summary: Senior Cloud Architect with 10 years experience designing and implementing large-scale cloud solutions. Azure certified expert. Led migration of 50+ applications to cloud with zero downtime.

name: Emily Rodriguez
title: Full Stack ML Engineer
summary: Full stack engineer specializing in ML-powered applications. 7 years building end-to-end ML products from model training to production APIs. Strong product sense and user-centric design approach.

name: David Kim
title: Data Engineering Lead
summary: Data Engineering Lead with 9 years building scalable data platforms. Led team of 8 engineers building real-time data pipelines processing 100TB+ daily. Expert in Azure data ecosystem.

name: Lisa Anderson
title: Senior Data Scientist
summary: Data Scientist with 6 years in healthcare and finance verticals. Specialized in computer vision and anomaly detection. Strong communication skills with track record of translating complex ML concepts to stakeholders.

name: Michael Chen
title: MLOps Engineer
summary: MLOps Engineer with 5 years automating ML model deployment and monitoring. Built platform serving 200+ models in production. Expert in Kubernetes, Azure ML, and ML observability tools.
